thread.title: Women’s Equality Party leader Sophie Walker: Mainstream political parties have failed to tackle gender inequality
thread.title_full: Women’s Equality Party leader Sophie Walker: Mainstream political parties have failed to tackle gender inequality - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Women’s Equality Party leader Sophie Walker: Mainstream political parties have failed to tackle gender inequality
text: Britain’s mainstream political parties have failed to tackle gender inequality, with men outearning women by hundreds of billions of pounds every year, the leader of the Women ’s Equality Party ( WEP ) will announce on 20 October . Sophie
